column2: Latest;Kampot: On the afternoon of October 16
column4: police in Kampot province detained a woman in connection with  drug dealing in Veal Village commune. Meanchey
column8: a 22-year-old woman living in the village
column9: was arrested and cops confiscated four small packages. ------Currently
column10: the police have built a case to send the suspect to the court to follow the legal process.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/266016
